Name: Storage
Description: A structure built to store water during times of high flow for a variety of purposes (e.g., water supply, irrigation etc.).

Name: Diversion
Description: A structure built to divert all or some of the water from a waterway into a man-made canal or conduit.

Name: Detention
Description: A structure built for flood control. Retains excess water in a reservoir to maintain the carrying capacity of the waterway, releasing it gradually at a controlled rate to protect downstream areas from flooding.

Name: Debris
Description: A structure built across a waterway to retain debris (e.g., driftwood, gravel, sand etc.).

Name: Coffer
Description: An enclosed temporary structure commonly used during construction. Water is pumped from the enclosure to provide a dry worksite.

Name: Saddle
Description: An auxiliary structure constructed at low spots along the perimeter of a reservoir to limit its extent, or to allow for an increase in storage capacity.

Name: Hydro - Closed-cycle pumped storage
Description: A facility configured to pump water between two water reservoirs at different elevations; both reservoirs are isolated from a free-flowing water source.

Name: Hydro - Conventional storage
Description: A facility that impounds water, which when released, flows through a turbine and generates electricity.

Name: Hydro - Open-cycle pumped storage
Description: A facility configured to pump water between two water reservoirs at different elevations; a free-flowing water source is used for either the upper or lower reservoir.

Name: Hydro - Run-of-river
Description: A facility that channels flowing water from a river through a canal or penstock to spin a turbine.

Name: Hydro - Tidal
Description: A facility configured to intake and store water during high tide and slowly release it back into the ocean during low tide.

Name: Other
Description: The function of the dam cannot be defined by the types listed in this table.

Name: Unknown
Description: No information is known regarding the function of the dam structure/facility.
